Body: The First Color Airdrop Event Was Successful! https://i.imgur.com/fOGF3w1.jpg  Hello, Color Supporters! Did you enjoy our first Airdrop live last week? How did you prepare for the first Airdrop Live? Jay: We saw several Airdrop videos to see how others have done it. Cindy : Please note that the live streaming itself is quite short. It doesn't take long to draw five people, so the broadcast ends very soon. If you're not on time, it may take a while for you to access the live on Facebook, so it might be faster to check the Airdrop tracker sheet. Thank you for supporting us! Title: [ANN][COL] Color Platform: Decentralized App Store! Apple of Blockchain!!
Body: The Color Platform marks Ethereum as its primary competitor. While the Ethereum Protocol helped kickstart the Smart Contract and dApp ecosystem, Ethereum quickly ran into scalability issues that dragged down every dApp on the platform. Currently, Ethereum is only able to support rudimentary dApps such as Cryptokitties and Etheroll.  The Color Platform focuses primarily on solving this scalability by first utilizing a software and hardware hybrid consensus algorithm that provides scalable instant transactions. In addition, the Color Team is developing the Color Development Kit (CDK) which enables anyone to develop dApp without any coding.

Body: Blockchain and the Decentralized Applications https://medium.com/colorsorg/blockchain-and-the-decentralized-applications-c78dbabcf7ab  ...Technology doesn’t exist for its own sake. We create new technologies to make our lives better, but one of the biggest challenges faced by many new technologies is how to make them accessible to the average user. Blockchain technology holds a great deal of promise for improving our lives, but Blockchain 1.0, as amazing as it is, doesn’t actually do much other than let users assign different parts of the blockchain to each other in one-off transactions. Cryptographers and other visionaries knew this was only the tip of the iceberg as to what was possible with this technology. Blockchain 2.0 allowed for the use of smart contracts, which allowed people to manipulate the blockchain automatically in response to environmental inputs, but they were still difficult to make and accessible to only a select few. dApps have finally made blockchains accessible to all kinds of users by letting them interact with blockchains in easy, familiar ways. dApps represent the first step in making blockchains accessible to everyone. Pixels are awarded on a periodic basis. Unless Pixels are given to a new users, sent to fund projects, or used for other community functions, they will disappear. The "Conditional Sharing Mechanism" aims to disincentivize hoarding and increase overall user participation in the system.  P2P CONSENSUS ALGORITHM To minimize power consumption and  transaction costs, a new solution to the Byzantine General’s Problem (BGP) is necessary. Researchers for the Color Project are currently at work testing a system that is a vast improvement to any currently implemented solution to the BGP. Most importantly, this solution maintains decentralization, security, and allows for scaling and speeds surpassing centralized payment providers such as Visa/Mastercard. The new consensus algorithm solves what the PoS (Proof of Stake) model originally hoped to achieve at scale, while still maintaining decentralization and security.   DAPPS We are still reliant on prototype level dApps that are plagued with scalability issues. Color aims to revolutionize the dApp ecosystem by developing Enterprise-Level dApps. The Color Team has dedicated massive amounts of resources to build "Mega dApps".  Currently, there are already more than 10 Mega dApps being developed on the Color Platform. Color dApps are powered by the single unifying Color Coin (COL), thereby making all the applications interoperable.  COLOR LEGAL “Color Legal” stores various legal records on the blockchain. Color Legal will provide notarization, certification, and confirmation date. Everyone has to deal with large and small legal contracts in our daily lives, however in order to legally receive & submit documents we must visit the court, registry office, ward office, and submit a seal certificate or letter of proxy. Additionally, for notarization you need the help of yet another administrative agency. Color Legal simplifies all of this and reduces costs. For example, a real estate contract or a money lending contract can be processed as a smart contract on Color Legal. When the conditions are met, interest payments or contract terminations can be automatically executed. Another notable example is legal executions of wills. If you place your will on Legalchain, if the conditions are met, Color Legal will ensure the immutable execution of your smart contract will.  COLOR MEDICAL “Color Medical” is a dApp that keeps your medical records secure through blockchain technology. First of all, we can make a big contribution to the medical industry by making it possible to obtain big data about medical care. When using personal medical data from universities, laboratories, etc., the individual who agrees to provide the data will receive compensation for the medical data in Color Coins. In addition, Color Medical enables accurate and efficient medical treatment based on data recorded individually from birth to the present. As the number of users increases and more data is accumulated, Color Medical will lay the foundations for developing into an artificial intelligence treatment platform.  COLOR TV “Color TV” is a global content distribution platform focused on K-Pop videos. The major global content distribution platforms used in various countries have two major problems: One is the lack of convenient payment methods to handle each country's currency and the other is that within that platform content consumers do not get any compensation. By using Color Coin as a payment and reward mechanism, Color TV makes it easy to purchase content from within your app and use it as a donation to content-creators via Color Coins. In addition, Color Coin contributed by consumers is distributed securely to the copyright holders, since the contract of copyright is concluded in advance with the content copyright holders (suppliers) through the Smart Platform of the Color Platform.   WHITE PAPER  Color's approach to writing the white paper is to first review and benchmark decentralized applications from different platforms. After careful review, we select and design few decentralized applications to present as our use cases. Once the design step is done, we use the combination of Color Engine Technology and Auto Smart Contract on Ethereum protocol to build and test the use cases. The final step is to evaluate, verify, and analyze the outcome from each use cases. Until all these steps are complete, we don’t start with writing the white paper because our goal is to back up our claims with real use cases and verifiable results.
